title: Yosemite National Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       Reservations Reservations are not required to enter Yosemite National Park, but we strongly recommend that you make reservations for lodging, camping, and backpacking. You can pay the park entrance fee upon arrival (there's no need to pay it in advance).
